content.content:
Hello Sohyun, I'm Saeri.
The first time I made you become my bias was during the Lovelution era, I saw your MV and thought you were so beautiful, I even watched your fancams over and over again, then I looked up about you and wow, it turns out you're a music producer too. I was like wow, this idol is so perfect. From then until now, you've been my favorite, I love the little things about you, you always put your fans first, always update your fans every day and I feel like you're more than just a fan and an idol, you really care about wav.
In 2025, you must be tired, you also need to rest and come back with enthusiasm, I miss you. 
Oh yeah, Sohyun, HAPPY BIRTHDAY I hope you're always happy, I just want you to be happiness girl in this world, I will also be happy and enthusiastic.
Sohyun, thank you for being there in the midst of the chaos that befell me in this world. I'm feels happiness again in this world because of you.
